revised_title: The Lethality and General Action of Echis carinatus Venom
tldr: The authors investigate the lethality and general effects of Echis carinatus venom on various animals, including frogs, rabbits, guinea pigs, rats, cats, and pigeons. They also compare the venom's effects to that of Sepedon venom, highlighting differences in lethality and symptoms across different species.
